Create an image gallery.

Source: R/pixture.R
pixture.Rd

Create an image gallery.

pixture(
  path,
  caption = NULL,
  preset = "grid",
  options = list(),
  width = "100%",
  height = NULL,
  elementId = NULL
)

Arguments

path

A character vector of paths to images.
caption

A character vector of captions for the images (Optional).
preset

A character denoting predefined layout style. Defaults to "grid".
options

A named list of freewall options, See http://kombai.github.io/freewall/#options.
width

A numeric denoting width of the widget.
height

A numeric in pixel denoting height of the widget.
elementId

A character denoting parent container ID.
